page.title: 08Housing, Murroes
page.content: The majority of houses in the area are either privately owned or privately rented. The only Council houses are situated in Wellbank. The largest village in the area is Wellbank, which contains a variety of house styles, including local authority houses, older style villas and cottages, and a fairly large housing estate. Other smaller communities are to be found at Kellas, which consists mainly of individual detached houses, and Westhall Terrace, which is a group pf terraced houses built originally to accommodate workers at the now disused Duntrune Quarries. There are plans for further building of private houses at Kellas, where two modern bungalows are at present being built, and at Bucklershead.
